  • Method Details

    • createMovie

      public void createMovie(String name, Model.MovieType type, String synopsis, String rating, double duration, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, String director, ArrayList<String> castList)
      Create a new movie and add it into the database file after validating the attributes If attributes are invalid, do nothing If database file exists, read existing records, append a new movie object, and save the file If database file does not exist, write movie object to a new file and save
      Parameters:
      name - Title of movie
      type - Type of movie
      synopsis - Synopsis of movie
      rating - Rating of movie
      duration - Duration of movie
      startDate - Release date of movie
      endDate - End date of movie
      director - Director of movie
      castList - List of cast in movie

    • getLastID

      public int getLastID()
      Return the ID of the last movie in the database
      Returns:
      int ID of last Movie in the database

    • readMovie

      public ArrayList<Model.Movie> readMovie()
      Read every Movie in the database file
      Returns:
      Movie Return list of Movies if found, else empty list

    • readMovieDetail

      public ArrayList<Model.Movie> readMovieDetail(int choice, Object attribute)
      Read every Movie in database file using value of a given attribute
      Parameters:
      choice - Name of cineplex to find
      attribute - Value of given attribute to search for
      Returns:
      Movie Return list of Movies if found, else null object

    • readMovieID

      public Model.Movie readMovieID(int ID)
      Read Movie in database file using ID passed in
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of cineplex to find
      Returns:
      movie Return Cineplex if found, else null object

    • updateMovie

      public void updateMovie(int choice, int movieID, Object newValue)
      Update a Movie's attribute in database file using given movie ID
      Parameters:
      choice - Attribute of movie to be updated
      movieID - ID of Movie to find
      newValue - New value of Movie's attribute

    • updateFile

      public void updateFile(String filename, ArrayList<Model.Movie> movieList)
      Overwrite database file with new data of list of Movie
      Parameters:
      filename - Filename to check
      movieList - New ArrayList of Movies to be written to the file

    • deleteMovie

      public void deleteMovie(int ID)
      Delete a Movie in the database file corresponding to the ID attribute passed in
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of Movie to delete
